alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Mason (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fulton and Mason Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Browning to near Bath to near Havana. Movement was north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Havana around 705 PM CDT. Lewistown, Vermont and Ipava around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cuba, St. David, Canton, Fairview, Farmington, Avon and London Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
